snippet: The censorship is another example of restrictions on news media freedom since the military takeover in July 2013 that put Abdel Fattah el-Sisi into power.
abstract: Egyptian authorities confiscate all copies of one of the country’s largest private newspapers in order to censor an article, just days after Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi vowed there would be no restrictions on free speech.

byline.contributor: Merna Thomas contributed reporting from Cairo, and Jodi Rudoren from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The censorship is another example of restrictions on news media freedom since the military takeover in July 2013 that put Abdel Fattah el-Sisi into power.

headline.main: Egypt Seizes Newspapers to Censor an Article
headline.print_headline: Egypt Seizes Newspapers to Censor an Article
